Sentence.value: The disorder most often affects the small intestine, but can also occur in the large intestine.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: The [[disorder|C0012634]] most often affects the small intestine, but can also occur in the [[large intestine|C0009368]].

Sentence.value: - Colonoscopy may be used to remove air from the large intestine.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: - [[Colonoscopy|C0009378]] may be used to remove air from the [[large intestine|C0009368]].

Sentence.value: - Neostigmine may be used to treat intestinal pseudo-obstruction that is only in the large bowel (Ogilvie's syndrome).
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: - [[Neostigmine|C0027679]] may be used to treat [[intestinal pseudo-obstruction|C0021847]] that is only in the large bowel ([[Ogilvie's syndrome|C1527395]]).

Sentence.value: However, vitamin B12 and other vitamin supplements should be used for patients with vitamin deficiency.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: However, [[vitamin B12|C0042845]] and other vitamin supplements should be used for [[patients|C0030705]] with [[vitamin deficiency|C1510471]].
